name: Story of Monster
description:
Story of Monster - is a 2D intuitive platformer with surviving elements where you are going to do hardcore levels playing as an alien monster. Your purpose is collecting human brains. After collecting all things on the level you will be opened the entrance to a space ship of people. Visiting this space ship the Monster will be able to get to the Earth which he desired to enslave.

Be careful doing the levels. Pay your attention on every detail because any wrong step will kill your monster. Don’t be sad in case your failure. After your death you will be able to do the level again at once.
